short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your new tab page with forecast

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Home Weather it's extension that allow you to replace the New Tab page with weather forecast up to 5 days in any city in the world and search with DuckDuckGo engine.
